short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts and comparisons for popular cryptocurrencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See the latest crypto asset prices in real-time.
Schedule alerts for the assets inside the browser to keep up with the ticker.

CryptoBase, the chrome extension allows you see latest prices of the assets in the crypto market. Search for details for any of the popular assets in the market right now. Set up alerts for the assets to keep track of ever changing crypto market.

CryptoBase Chrome Extension allows you to:
•  See latest cryptocurrency prices.
•  Search for popular cryptocurrencies.
•  Set up notifications for price change of your selected assets,

What new things are coming? 
We're working on: 
•  Having different fiat currencies for comparison.
•  Choice of setting duration of notification as per user choice(currently at 10 mins).
